svg:
for some reason this was scaled down from 36×36 to 35×35, despite fitting perfectly in the bounding box. I would highly recommend undoing this, since it ruins the alignment, and generally emojis don't have extra padding (also keep in mind that twitter/twemoji adds margins when displaying emojis anyway) 0.9722.. = 35/36
i could've fixed this but it's just too silly www
#EABAA7 and #F7DED5 are unique colors
